functionDecorators.name: annualizedBorrowRate
functionDecorators.description: Calculate the annualized borrow rate from the specified borrowing rate.

parameterDecorators.name: _borrowRate
parameterDecorators.description: rate for a 1 second interval specified in RAY accuracy.

functionDecorators.name: calculateBaseDebt
functionDecorators.description: Calculate the base debt from a specified total debt and cumulative rate.

parameterDecorators.name: _debt
parameterDecorators.description: the total debt to be used.

parameterDecorators.name: _cumulativeRate
parameterDecorators.description: the cumulative rate in RAY accuracy.

functionDecorators.name: calculateCumulativeRate
functionDecorators.description: Bring an existing cumulative rate forward in time.

parameterDecorators.name: _borrowRate
parameterDecorators.description: rate for a 1 second interval specified in RAY accuracy to be applied.

parameterDecorators.name: _cumulativeRate
parameterDecorators.description: the initial cumulative rate from which to apply the borrow rate.

parameterDecorators.name: _timeElapsed
parameterDecorators.description: the time over whicht the borrow rate shall be applied.

functionDecorators.name: calculateDebt
functionDecorators.description: Calculate the total debt from a specified base debt and cumulative rate.

parameterDecorators.name: _baseDebt
parameterDecorators.description: the base debt to be used. Can be a vault base debt or an aggregate base debt.

parameterDecorators.name: _cumulativeRate
parameterDecorators.description: the cumulative rate in RAY accuracy.
